title: FoodPigs - 在主城建一个猪出生点，为玩家提供食物吧！
author: 大猫云计算
txt_content:
本帖最后由 大猫云计算 于 2019-10-24 04:14 编辑 

FoodPigs -最好的FoodPig-插件该插件添加猪到你的服务器能够被玩家杀死，以获得食物*。





68a6cacf72b9c2b784beb65e9f36212402006cb7.png (208.8 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2019-10-24 04:00 上传







 特点 -100％的定制
- reload命令
- 100％免费
-可配置的重生冷却
-自定义名称
-创建无限的FoodPigs-
干净且优化的代码
-使用简单的命令设置您自己的下拉菜单项
-禁用经验掉落的
选项-设置FoodPig的生命值

- Option to prevent boat-stealing of FoodPigs in 1.12+
选项-防止在1.12中盗用FoodPigs的选项+






Config.ymlsettings:[/COLOR][/B][/SIZE][/SIZE]
[SIZE=5][SIZE=7][B][COLOR=#808080]  pig-name: '&cKill me!'[/COLOR][/B][/SIZE][/SIZE]
[SIZE=5][SIZE=7][B][COLOR=#808080]  respawn-delay: 1[/COLOR][/B][/SIZE][/SIZE]
[SIZE=5][SIZE=7][B][COLOR=#808080]  dropxp: true[/COLOR][/B][/SIZE][/SIZE]
[SIZE=5][SIZE=7][B][COLOR=#808080]  health: 20.0[/COLOR][/B][/SIZE][/SIZE]
[SIZE=5][SIZE=7][B][COLOR=#808080]  fix-boat-steal: true[/COLOR][/B][/SIZE][/SIZE]
[SIZE=5][SIZE=7][B][COLOR=#808080]messages:[/COLOR][/B][/SIZE][/SIZE]
[SIZE=5][SIZE=7][B][COLOR=#808080]  noperms: '&c[FoodPigs] No permissions.'[/COLOR][/B][/SIZE][/SIZE]
[SIZE=5][SIZE=7][B][COLOR=#808080]  created: '&c[FoodPigs] &aYou have created a FoodPig at your location.'[/COLOR][/B][/SIZE][/SIZE]
[SIZE=5][SIZE=7][B][COLOR=#808080]  removed: '&c[FoodPigs] &aYou have removed this FoodPig. Type /foodpig remove to[/COLOR][/B][/SIZE][/SIZE]
[SIZE=5][SIZE=7][B][COLOR=#808080]    exit the removingmode.'[/COLOR][/B][/SIZE][/SIZE]
[SIZE=5][SIZE=7][B][COLOR=#808080]  removingmodeon: '&c[FoodPigs] &aYou are now in the removingmode. Right click a FoodPig,[/COLOR][/B][/SIZE][/SIZE]
[SIZE=5][SIZE=7][B][COLOR=#808080]    to remove. Type /foodpig remove to exit.'[/COLOR][/B][/SIZE][/SIZE]
[SIZE=5][SIZE=7][B][COLOR=#808080]  removingmodeoff: '&c[FoodPigs] &aYou are no longer in the removingmode.'[/COLOR][/B][/SIZE][/SIZE]
[SIZE=5][SIZE=7][B][COLOR=#808080]  usage: '&c[FoodPigs] &cUse: /foodpigs spawn|remove|reload|setdrop'[/COLOR][/B][/SIZE][/SIZE]
[SIZE=5][SIZE=7][B][COLOR=#808080]  reload: '&c[FoodPigs] &aThe Plugin has been reloadet.'[/COLOR][/B][/SIZE][/SIZE]
[SIZE=5][SIZE=7][B][COLOR=#808080]  dropset: '&c[FoodPigs] &aYou have set the drop item.'[/COLOR][/B][/SIZE][/SIZE]
[SIZE=5][SIZE=7][B][COLOR=#808080]  noiteminhand: '&c[FoodPigs] &aYou must hold an item in your hand.'复制代码


指令 Commands 
/foodpigs spawn - 设置猪的出生点在你的位置
/foodpigs remove - 进入/退出删除模式
/foodpigs reload - 重载配置文件
/foodpigs setdrop - 设置手上的物品为猪的掉落物品


 权限 Permissions 
foodpigs.admin


 下载 Download 
                                                     原贴下载地址 https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/%E2%AD%90-foodpigs-the-best-pigspawner-plugin-%E2%AD%90-citybuild-food-pigs-1-8-1-12-1-14-recode.70064/
